LanguageData.IF.SelectSpawnThingDesc: Click to select a crop to harvest
LanguageData.IF.UnderfarmInoperable: Underfarm is not operable. Requires power, unroofed place and working water main nearby.
LanguageData.IF.GetHonorQuestForSilver: Request a royal commission for 5000 silver
LanguageData.IF.LetterLabelFoundRaidersNearbyDesc: {FINDER_nameDef} has found raider forces roaming nearby using the surveillance console! Nearby settlements were notified of them and they took actions against them. Raid threat is reduced approximately by {1} combat points.
LanguageData.IF.Active: Active: receiving data from surveliance pillar.
